name: WorkFlowy Width And Custom Tag Colors
description: Widens workflowy text space and provides custom colors for predefined #tags.
additional_info: Just for personal use. A combination of the styles "Workflowy Custom Tag Colors" (https://userstyles.org/styles/112356/workflowy-custom-tag-colors) and "WorkFlowy [full width list]" (https://userstyles.org/styles/125596/workflowy-full-width-list).
